sets.description: The maximum number of Snake Chain members is increased to **5**. When equipped with at least **1** physical weapon, increase physical ATK by **18%/22%/26%/30%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

After a target is inflicted with Snake Bite, increase physical ATK by **20%**, lasting for **30** seconds, while also taking effect in the background. Upon entering combat, increase final damage by **28%/32%/36%/40%**.
